item.title: 40 Gbps Bandwidth Available For Business
item.description:
XO Communications has increased business bandwidth options by offering two 40 Gbps network services across its nationwide fiber optic network. Randy Nicklas, XO Communications’ CTO, highlights the advantages of these new 40 Gbps services: You can listen to the interview directly on this page: Clearly, we’re entering a new era of high-bandwidth applications for businesses and service providers like cable companies. High-speed financial trading needs the fastest speeds, with even milliseconds of delay impacting outcomes...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/40-gbps-bandwidth-available-for-business/
